items.consumables

Class AbstractConsumable

  • java.lang.Object
    • items.consumables.AbstractConsumable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Consumable, Item
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTimedConsumable, HealthPotion

    public abstract class AbstractConsumable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Consumable
    This class handles the getters and setters for the Consumable family of classes, as well as the .equals() and .toString() methods.

    This abstract class implements the getter and setter statements from the Consumable interface and the .getName(), .setName(), .equals() and .toString() statements from the Item interface. It houses the protected variables buffedStat, mod, duration, and name for use in the constructors of individual Consumable-type objects.

    Author:
    Dr. Cheese
